node.display_long_description:
Grab your favourite guns, customize them and experience action like you never have before!

# GAMEPLAY
Rise through the ranks to unlock a wide variety of weapons and attachments (with realistic physics!), climb, jump, crouch, shoot, reload, repeat - be prepared for a mind-blowingly immersive experience! 

# SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN
You'll find yourself in a war-ridden, dystopian United States as a newly enlisted OSA soldier. What does OSA stand for? Outer States of America, the last bastion of hope. 
War over water destroyed the world as we know it. You have an important mission: fight your way through the mysterious Tlalokii and find out their secrets.. 

# CO-OPERATIVE MODE
Invite your friends to your Co-op session, communicate via the built-in voice chat feature and fight through the whole campaign together!

# POST-RELEASE UPDATES
Keep an eye out for future updates, the fun doesn't end here. ;) 

# SUPPORT
If you encounter any issues, please contact us: support@xrealgames.com

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Version 1.0.249 Changelog

# MULTIPLAYER

- Added a region selector popup window to make selecting the appropriate server region easier (previously the EU region was set as defult which could be overlooked thus resulting in high ping sessions)
- Fixed a rare issue where finding friends' Co-op sessions was not possible if there were too many sessions running on the servers
- Fixed a rare issue where inviting friends/accepting invites returned an error
- Fixed an issue that could occasionally result in a Co-op session crash
- Improved overall server-side stability

# GAMEPLAY

Taking player feedback into account, we rebalanced the 3 difficulties: 
- Increased enemy AI accuracy 
- Decreased player HP

------

If you encounter any issues, please contact us at support@xrealgames.com
More updates are on the way so stay tuned, and have fun!

nodes.title: New patch - Server/friend invite fixes, difficulty rebalance
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone,

First of all thank you for the amazing reception and all the feedback/rating, keep 'em coming! <3

In this hotfix patch we fixed some server-side issues that came up in the first 2 days and made it easier to select the appropriate server region when creating a Co-op session. 
We also made changes to the enemy AI's accuracy and player health to make the game a bit more difficult (based on your feedback).

Version 1.0.249 changelog

MULTIPLAYER

- Added a region selector popup window to make selecting the appropriate server region easier (previously the EU region was set as default which could be overlooked thus resulting in high ping sessions)
- Fixed a rare issue where finding friends' Co-op sessions was not possible if there were too many sessions running on the servers
- Fixed a rare issue where inviting friends/accepting invites returned an error
- Fixed an issue that could occasionally result in a Co-op session crash
- Improved overall server-side stability

GAMEPLAY

- Increased enemy AI accuracy
- Decreased player HP

CONTACT US

We'd love to hear your feedback!
- Join our Discord to share your first impressions and suggestions, find Co-op buddies, or just hang out
- Follow us on Twitter to catch future update news and server related info
- If you encounter any technical issues, please send us an email to support@xrealgames.com

See you in-game!
Dan & the whole XREAL Games Team

nodes.title: Zero Caliber: Reloaded is available NOW!
nodes.body_text:
Hi everyone,

Zero Caliber: Reloaded is now available on Oculus Quest 1 & 2!
Are you ready to take the fight to the mysterious Tlalokii?
Fight them alone in single player or with your friends in Co-op - either way, hours of explosive action awaits you!

PLAY NOW
We hope you'll have as much fun as we had developing the game. :)

GAMEPLAY

After going through the basics as a newly enlisted OSA soldier, you'll be taken right into action. 
Rise through the ranks, unlock new weapons and attachments, customize them to find your style and... give 'em hell! 
Pro tip: grab grenade pins with your teeth, knock out mags with another one or dual-wield pistols while reloading akimbo style for extra cool points!

Remember: always use cover, master your weapon and mind your surroundings!

FUTURE UPDATES

The fun doesn't end here! We'll release regular, free updates throughout the year, so stay tuned for those!

CONTACT US

We'd love to hear your feedback!
- Join our Discord to share your first impressions and suggestions, find Co-op buddies, or just hang out
- Follow us on Twitter to catch future update news and server related info
- If you encounter any technical issues, please send us an email to support@xrealgames.com

See you in-game! 
Dan & the whole XREAL Games Team

node.reviewDescription:
I wish I could give this one 3.5 out of 4, its definitely better than a 3 out of 5 but I'm not sure its all the way worth 4 out of 5...its a tough one!

Zero Caliber Reloaded does a great job of transferring the incredibly enjoyable gun mechanics, modular attachments & physics fun over to the Quest platform but it does so at the high cost of the visuals that the fully fledged PC VR version has. This leaves Zero Caliber Reloaded feeling like a strange game that's stuck between eras, the AI & visuals remind me of Goldeneye/classic N64 era shooters but the impressive gunplay & the way you interact with the tools of destruction at your fingertips feel like some of the most impressive shooting on the Quest... 

Ultimately I've had a tonne of fun everytime I've loaded up Zero Caliber on the Quest, the multiplayer is a real high point and being able to blast through levels with a couple of friends whilst throwing each other different guns & attachments to try is a real treat.

If you're looking for a campaign driven, co-op, military shooter for the Quest then Zero Caliber will likely keep you entertained but go in prepared for wonky AI, some throwback visuals & a healthy handful of bugs (most of which are pretty hilarious)

Quest 2 Gameplay - https://youtu.be/ECVDpa5dkrE
node.reviewTitle: A weird blend of old & new

developerResponse.body:
Hi Benjo,
Thanks very much for your honest feedback and opinion.
Both AI and visual improvements are already in the works. Along with those changes bugfixes will also come in a patch very soon, so you might enjoy the hilarious ones for a limited time only :) Have fun until then!
Mark & the XREAL Games team

website_page_meta.description:
Zero Caliber: Reloaded is a story based military shooter with a full-blown single player campaign and Co-operative mode (up to 4 players).
Rise through the ranks to unlock a wide variety of weapons and attachments, customize them, climb, jump, crouch, shoot, get to cover, reload, invite your friends, repeat - be prepared for a mind-blowingly immersive experience!
website_page_meta.title: Zero Caliber: Reloaded · Oculus Quest
